price: 42. Baadil ugama yimaado hortiisa ama gadaashiisa16; waa Waxyi laga soo dejiyey xagga Xakiim, Ammaanan (Alle).
arabic: لَّا يَأۡتِيهِ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَلَا مِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦۖ تَنزِيلٞ مِّنۡ حَكِيمٍ حَمِيدٖ
footnotes: 16. Aan isagoo kale la keeni karin, aan waxba looga qaadin in wax laga sheego, uuna yahay Kitaab uu Alle dhowray.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā yatīhi al-bāṭilu min bayni yadayhi walā min khalfihi tanzīlun min ḥakīmin ḥamīdin
